-	open(LDIF, ">$fedora_ds_dir/dse.ldif");
+	open(LDIF, ">>$fedora_ds_dir/dse.ldif");
 	print LDIF "
 dn: cn=bitwise,cn=plugins,cn=config
 objectClass: top
